header.title: Professional Network
header.subtitle: Connect with an experienced executive passionate about organizational excellence and positive impact. Let's discuss business development, strategic partnerships, or leadership opportunities.
header.callToAction: With 23+ years of experience in developing multinational organizations, I'm always open to connecting with business leaders and professionals.

contactMethods.title: Professional Email
contactMethods.description: Preferred for business discussions and opportunities
contactMethods.availability: Response within 24 hours during business days

placeholders.message: Please describe your business opportunity, partnership proposal, or how we can collaborate for mutual growth...

responseInfo.standardResponse: I typically respond within 24 hours during business days (Sunday-Thursday, GMT+6).
responseInfo.urgentMatters: For urgent business matters, please call directly or mark your email as 'URGENT - Business Matter'.
responseInfo.partnerships: Partnership and collaboration inquiries will be reviewed by our team and responded to within 48 hours.

expertise.description: Strategic business planning and organizational development
